selected_skills.name: calc_numeric
selected_skills.purpose: To compute the total volume from the volume markings extracted from the diagram.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to perform any necessary arithmetic operations to determine the total volume based on the markings.

selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: To format the final answer for the multiple-choice question.
selected_skills.how_to_use: Use this skill to format the computed total volume into the required answer format.

new_skill_specs.name: interpret_volume_markings
new_skill_specs.purpose: To interpret the volume markings from the diagram and determine the total volume of the measuring cup.
